document_data.name: Bowsar Ostramarr
document_data.mainbody: '''Bowsar Ostramarr''' was a [[War Wizard]] of [[Cormyr]] in the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Activities: He liked to spend time at [[The Downed Falcon]], a tavern.
document_data.History: One of the [[Waterdhavian]] [[thief]] [[Narnra Shalace]]'s first assignments as a spy for the [[Royal Magician of Cormyr]], [[Caladnei]] was to eavesdrop Bowsar Ostramarr, among others.{{cite book/Elminster's Daughter/MMP|313|18}}
